articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Things looked dire for Solana on Wednesday, but SOL is climbing again after a softened staking unlock had only modest impact.

articles.description: FTX US Derivatives will “soon be entirely separate” from FTX, CEO Zach Dexter wrote in the letter.

articles.description: FTX’s sinking ship needs capital. It's looking to Kraken for aid, according to reports, but cofounder Jesse Powell doesn't sound very interested.

articles.description: After a wild week, a badly beaten market at last gets some relief.

articles.description: Grayscale Bitcoin Trust (GBTC) is now trading at its all-time low discount of more than 40% to the spot price of Bitcoin.

articles.description: If all crypto tokens are classified as securities, the SEC can go after the largest exchanges and marketplaces.
articles.title: The SEC Beat LBRY. Will It Go After Exchanges Like Coinbase Next?

articles.description: In a lengthy Twitter thread against the FTX exchange, Jesse Powell said the crisis was "a massive setback" for the industry.
articles.title: FTX Crisis Is a 'Gift to Bitcoin Haters': Kraken Founder Jesse Powell

articles.description: CoinShares revealed it has a hefty amount of Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other assets trapped on the exchange but has no exposure to Alameda Research.

articles.description: "When markets turned on them, it appears that a lot of customers lost money," said SEC Chair Gary Gensler on Thursday morning.

articles.description: FTX chief Sam Bankman-Fried allegedly used customer funds to support the exchange’s sister firm Alameda Research.

articles.description: "They aren't doing any of the weird things that I see on Twitter—and nothing large at all," SBF said.
articles.title: SBF Says He Will Wind Down Alameda and Spend the Week Trying to Raise Money for FTX

articles.description: The Tron founder’s statements prompted a spike in the value of Sun-related cryptocurrencies currently trapped on crypto exchange FTX.
articles.title: Tron's Justin Sun Announces Plans to Return ‘Normalcy for All FTX Users’

articles.description: Amid the collapse of FTX exchange, leading cryptocurrencies in Bitcoin, Ethereum, Binance Coin, Polkadot, and Solana have continued to nosedive.

articles.description: Coinbase CEO Brian Armstrong was responding to Elizabeth Warren’s calls for more aggressive SEC enforcement amid FTX's downfall.

articles.description: The liquidity crunch threatens to send FTX into bankruptcy, Sam Bankman-Fried reportedly told investors this afternoon.

articles.description: Leaders and builders are trying to keep positive spirits despite the crashing price, triggered by crypto exchange FTX’s unraveling.

articles.description: Though not the rumored digital wallet, the filing indicates a financial services angle for the land of the blue checkmark.

articles.description: After Binance announced its intent to acquire competitor FTX on Tuesday, the crypto exchange has called off the deal.

articles.description: Notable Web3 creators are stepping up their pushback after OpenSea said it’s reconsidering enforcement of NFT creator royalties.
articles.title: Adam Bomb Squad Cancels OpenSea NFT Drop Over Royalties Dispute: 'Artists Are Always in Control'

articles.description: As Binance pulls out of an FTX acquisition, Sam Bankman-Fried’s exchanges are facing regulatory scrutiny in the U.S.

articles.description: Singapore-based Crypto.com told users via email that it had halted withdrawals and deposits for two popular stablecoins on Solana.

articles.description: The price of the biggest cryptocurrency has not stopped plunging—taking most of the digital asset market with it.

articles.description: With today’s launch of an original character, UMG’s 10:22PM label is showing more of its plan for an immersive NFT music experience.

articles.description: "We need to hold ourselves to a higher standard than even in banks," CZ wrote in the note to employees he shared on Twitter.

articles.description: Binance's shock acquisition of FTX on Tuesday prompted many crypto companies to deny any exposure to Bankman-Fried's companies.

articles.description: Despite rocky markets, TRM Labs has raised fresh funds to expand its product and talent as demand for crypto compliance continues growing.

articles.description: Facebook's parent company Meta is firing 13% of its workforce in a bid to restructure its business and reduce costs.
articles.title: Zuckerberg Confirms 'Long-Term Vision' for Metaverse as Meta Fires 11,000 Employees

articles.description: Binance's surprise FTX acquisition claims appear to have sparked a significant 24-hour drop for Bitcoin and Ethereum.
articles.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Plummet as Crypto Market Falls Below $1 Trillion Overnight

articles.description: With Bitcoin and Ethereum plummeting double-digits, the Binance chief said the move was to adjust to “recent price fluctuations.”

articles.description: Cathie Wood’s investment house took another opportunity to buy the dip, snapping a sizeable amount of Coinbase stock on Tuesday.

articles.description: FTX currently holds over 56 million shares of Robinhood stock.

articles.description: FTX’s token plunged nearly 80% following news that Binance would acquire Sam Bankman-Fried’s crypto exchange.

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: Yuga Labs’ founders rail against marketplaces that are rejecting creator royalties, suggesting a DAO-governed allowlist system.
articles.title: Bored Ape Founders Propose NFT Royalties Model, Decry OpenSea’s Stance as 'Not Great'

articles.author: Mathew Di Salvo
articles.description: The super rich celebs were sued in January for allegedly pumping and dumping an obscure Ethereum-based token.
articles.title: Kim Kardashian, Floyd Mayweather Set to Win Ethereum Max Lawsuit

articles.author: Andrew Throuvalas
articles.description: Changpeng “CZ” Zhao says the industry can’t simply say, "Trust me, bro."
articles.title: Binance CEO Promises to Implement ‘Proof of Reserves’ After Run on FTX

articles.author: Andrew Hayward
articles.description: FTX spent big on Web3 investments, gaming tech, and esports deals, but the future of those endeavors is now unclear.
articles.title: What Happens to FTX’s Gaming and NFT Biz If Binance Deal Goes Through?

articles.description: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.
articles.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market

articles.description: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the  crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.
articles.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough

articles.description: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.
articles.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022

articles.description: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi

articles.description: Stacy Neale of Dacoco, producer of Alien Worlds, tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson  at NFT Expoverse 2022 how Alien Worlds has a "DAO ecosystem" inside its game, and says it's "more than a game, more than DAOs, more than a  metaverse."
articles.title: In the Alien Worlds Metaverse Game, DAOs Are Game Pieces

articles.description: Bored Ape Yacht Club co-founders Wylie Aronow ("Gordon Goner") and Greg Solano ("Garga") joined Dan Roberts and Kate Irwin on the gm podcast to talk about BAYC parent company Yuga Labs and its size and influence in the space, Ape haters, NFT haters, the SEC investigating Yuga, Buzzfeed "doxxing" Aronow and Solano earlier this year, their vision for the Otherside metaverse realm, and much more. Watch Episode 21 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
articles.title: gm: Meet the Bored Apes

articles.description: Cryptex CEO Joe Sticco joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott at Chainlink SmartCon 2022 to talk about how Cryptex is working with Chainlink and Coinbase Cloud to launch a token that tracks the performance of the entire NFT market and why such an asset might bring new people into NFTs and make the market more accessible.
articles.title: Cryptex Is Launching a Token That Tracks the Overall NFT Market Cap

articles.description: Ethereum co-founder and ConsenSys CEO Joe Lubin joined Decrypt's Dan Roberts on October 4 for a deep-dive chat on the Ethereum merge and aftermath, what's keeping the crypto market down, why he's super bullish on NFTs and the metaverse, whether it's really a multichain future, and much more.
articles.title: Joe Lubin: How the Ethereum Merge Went, Why ETH Is Down, NFTs, Metaverse, and the 'Killer App'
